mapper.select: select id, sku_id, sku_name, sku_num, task_id, ware_id, lock_status from wms_ware_order_task_detail where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into wms_ware_order_task_detail(sku_id, sku_name, sku_num, task_id, ware_id, lock_status) values (#{skuId}, #{skuName}, #{skuNum}, #{taskId}, #{wareId}, #{lockStatus})

insert into wms_ware_order_task_detail(sku_id, sku_name, sku_num, task_id, ware_id, lock_status) values
(#{entity.skuId}, #{entity.skuName}, #{entity.skuNum}, #{entity.taskId}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.lockStatus})

insert into wms_ware_order_task_detail(sku_id, sku_name, sku_num, task_id, ware_id, lock_status) values
(#{entity.skuId}, #{entity.skuName}, #{entity.skuNum}, #{entity.taskId}, #{entity.wareId}, #{entity.lockStatus})
on duplicate key update sku_id = values(sku_id), sku_name = values(sku_name), sku_num = values(sku_num), task_id = values(task_id), ware_id = values(ware_id), lock_status = values(lock_status)
mapper.update:
update wms_ware_order_task_detail
sku_id = #{skuId},
sku_name = #{skuName},
sku_num = #{skuNum},
task_id = #{taskId},
ware_id = #{wareId},
lock_status = #{lockStatus},
where id = #{id}
